public ref class NetworkInformationPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission
type NetworkInformationPermission = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: Controls access to network information and traffic statistics for the local computer.

span.span: Controls access to network information and traffic statistics for the local computer.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks このアクセス許可を使用してクラスによって返されるデータの保護、名前空間。This permission is used to secure data returned by the classes in the namespace. 宣言型セキュリティを使用して、クラス。For declarative security, use the class. ## Examples 次の例では、無制限のアクセス許可オブジェクトを作成します。The following example creates an unrestricted permission object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 2 つのアクセス許可の積集合は、両方に共通する状態を記述する権限です。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the state they both describe in common. 元の両方の権限を通過する要求だけでは、積集合を渡します。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. ## Examples 次の例では、既存のアクセス許可オブジェクトの積集合を表すアクセス許可オブジェクトを作成します。The following example creates a permission object that is the intersection of existing permission objects. summary.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 現在のアクセス許可は、現在のアクセス許可を指定した権限によって完全に含まれる状態を指定する場合、指定したアクセス許可のサブセットです。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a state that is wholly contained by the specified permission. このメソッドが true を返す場合、現在のアクセス許可は以上へのアクセスが保護されたリソースは、指定した権限を表しません。If this method returns true, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission. ## Examples 次のコード例では、2 つのアクセス許可のサブセットの関係を表示します。The following code example displays the subset relationship between two permissions. [!code-cpp[NclNetworkInfoPerms#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNetworkInfoPerms/CPP/NclNetworkInfoPerms.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NclNetworkInfoPerms#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNetworkInfoPerms/CS/permissionexample.cs#5)] [!code-vb[NclNetworkInfoPerms#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNetworkInfoPerms/VB/permissionexample.vb#5)]

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks メソッドは、現在のアクセス許可と指定した権限の両方で表されるすべての状態を表すアクセス許可を返します。The method returns a permission that represents all the states represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. いずれかのアクセス許可に適合する要求は、その共用体を渡します。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. ## Examples 次の例では、既存のアクセス許可オブジェクトの和集合を表すアクセス許可オブジェクトを作成します。The following example creates a permission object that is the union of existing permission objects.
